docs.snippet: Aging can shrink the brain, but older men and women who ate a Mediterranean-style diet had less loss of brain volume than those not following the diet....
docs.lead_paragraph: Aging can shrink the brain, but older men and women who ate a Mediterranean-style diet had less loss of brain volume than those not following the diet.

headline.main: Mediterranean Diet May Be Good for the Brain
